Then bitter affliction came to [us]7652-our , and [her]174-sue intellect broke , and [she]174-sue veered round to darkness . Strange difference of sex , that time and circumstance , which enlarge the views of [most men]903-most men , narrow the views of [women]3879-women almost invariably . And now the ultimate horror has come - [her]174-sue giving [herself]174-sue like this to what [she]174-sue loathes , in [her]174-sue enslavement to forms ! [She]174-sue , so sensitive , so shrinking , that the very wind seemed to blow on [her]174-sue with a touch of deference ... As for [Sue]174-sue and [me]313-mrs. edlin when [we]7652-our were at [our]7652-our own best , long ago - when [our]7652-our minds were clear , and [our]7652-our love of truth fearless - the time was not ripe for [us]7652-our ! [Our]7652-our ideas were fifty years too soon to be any good to [us]7652-our . And so the resistance [they]7655-they met with brought reaction in [her]174-sue , and recklessness and ruin on [me]313-mrs. edlin ! ... There - this , [Mrs. Edlin]313-mrs. edlin , is how [I]313-mrs. edlin go on to [myself]313-mrs. edlin continually , as [I]313-mrs. edlin lie here . "[4069-nobody] As [Jude]180-jude reflected more and more on [her]3752-her news , and grew more restless , [he]180-jude began in [his]180-jude mental agony to use terribly profane language about social conventions , which started a fit of coughing . Presently there came a knock at the door [downstairs]4245-downstairs . As [nobody]4069-nobody answered it [Mrs. Edlin]313-mrs. edlin [herself]313-mrs. edlin went down . [The visitor]5794-the visitor said blandly : " [The doctor]7044-the doctor . "[189-vilbert] [Vilbert]189-vilbert went ; but though [Jude]180-jude had hitherto taken the medicines of [that skilful practitioner]3757-that skilful practitioner with the greatest indifference whenever poured down [his]180-jude throat by [Arabella]305-arabella , [he]180-jude was now so brought to bay by events that [he]180-jude vented [his]180-jude opinion of [Vilbert]189-vilbert in [the physician]4032-the physician 's face , and so forcibly , and with such striking epithets , that [Vilbert]189-vilbert soon scurried [downstairs]4245-downstairs again . At the door [he]189-vilbert met [Arabella]305-arabella , [Mrs. Edlin]313-mrs. edlin having left . [Arabella]305-arabella inquired how [he]189-vilbert thought [[her]305-arabella husband]3921-her husband was now , and seeing that [the doctor]7044-the doctor looked ruffled , asked [him]189-vilbert to take something . "[305-arabella] [She]305-arabella let [him]189-vilbert out of [the house]504-the house , and as [she]305-arabella went back [she]305-arabella said to [herself]305-arabella : " Well ! [Weak women]7667-weak women must provide for a rainy day . And [I]305-arabella ca n't pick and choose now as [I]305-arabella could when [I]305-arabella was younger . And [one]810-one must take the old if one ca n't get [the young]7671-the young . "[305-arabella] XI The last pages to which [the chronicler of these lives]3763-the chronicler of these lives would ask [the reader]3764-the reader 's attention are concerned with the scene in and out of [[Jude]180-jude 's bedroom]3765-jude 's bedroom when leafy summer came round again . [His]180-jude face was now so thin that [[his]180-jude old friends]3766-his old friends would hardly have known [him]180-jude . It was afternoon , and [Arabella]305-arabella was at the looking - glass curling [her]305-arabella hair , which operation [she]305-arabella performed by heating an umbrella - stay in the flame of a candle [she]305-arabella had lighted , and using it upon the flowing lock . When [she]305-arabella had finished this , practised a dimple , and put on [her]305-arabella things , [she]305-arabella cast [her]305-arabella eyes round upon [Jude]180-jude . [He]180-jude seemed to be sleeping , though [his]180-jude position was an elevated one , [his]180-jude malady preventing [him]180-jude lying down . [Arabella]305-arabella , hatted , gloved , and ready , sat down and waited , as if expecting [some one]3767-some one to come and take [her]305-arabella place as [nurse]3768-nurse . Certain sounds from without revealed that [the town]4154-the town was in festivity , though little of the festival , whatever it might have been , could be seen [here]3898-here . Bells began to ring , and the notes came into [the room]4227-the room through the open window , and travelled round [Jude]180-jude 's head in a hum . They made [her]305-arabella restless , and at last [she]305-arabella said to [herself]305-arabella : " Why ever does n't [Father]228-father come ! "[305-arabella] [She]305-arabella looked again at [Jude]180-jude , critically gauged [his]180-jude ebbing life , as [she]305-arabella had done so many times during the late months , and glancing at [his]180-jude watch , which was hung up by way of timepiece , rose impatiently . Still [he]180-jude slept , and coming to a resolution [she]305-arabella slipped from [the room]4227-the room , closed the door noiselessly , and descended the stairs . [The house]504-the house was empty . The attraction which moved [Arabella]305-arabella to go abroad had evidently drawn away [the other inmates]3774-the other inmates long before . It was a warm , cloudless , enticing day . [She]305-arabella shut the front door , and hastened round into [Chief Street]84-chief street , and when near [the theatre]6924-the theatre could hear the notes of the organ , a rehearsal for a coming concert being in progress . [She]305-arabella entered under the archway of [Oldgate College]157-oldgate college , where [men]716-men were putting up awnings round [the quadrangle]1108-the quadrangle for a ball in [the hall]6077-the hall that evening . [People who had come up from [the country]4234-the country for the day]3779-people who had come up from the country for the day were picnicking on the grass , and [Arabella]305-arabella walked along [the gravel paths]3781-the gravel paths and under [the aged limes]3782-the aged limes . But finding [this place]3919-this place rather dull [she]305-arabella returned to [the streets]680-the streets , and watched the carriages drawing up for the concert , [numerous dons]3785-numerous dons and [[their]3785-numerous dons wives]2793-their wives , and undergraduates with [gay female companions]3787-gay female companions , crowding up likewise . When the doors were closed , and the concert began , [she]305-arabella moved on . The powerful notes of that concert rolled forth through the swinging yellow blinds of the open windows , over [the housetops]3788-the housetops , and into the still air of [the lanes]4091-the lanes . [They]3790-they reached so far as to [the room in which [Jude]180-jude lay]3791-the room in which jude lay ; and it was about this time that [his]180-jude cough began again and awakened [him]180-jude . As soon as [he]180-jude could speak [he]180-jude murmured , [his]180-jude eyes still closed : " A little water , please . "[180-jude] Nothing but [the deserted room]3792-the deserted room received [his]180-jude appeal , and [he]180-jude coughed to exhaustion again - saying still more feebly : " Water - some water - [Sue - Arabella]406-arabella ! "[180-jude] [The room]4227-the room remained still as before . Presently [he]180-jude gasped again : " Throat - water - Sue - darling - drop of water - please - oh please ! "[180-jude] No water came , and the organ notes , faint as a bee 's hum , rolled in as before . While [he]180-jude remained , [his]180-jude face changing , shouts and hurrahs came from somewhere in [the direction of [the river]5250-the river]3794-the direction of the river . " Ah - yes ! The Remembrance games , "[180-jude] [he]180-jude murmured . " And [I]180-jude here . And [Sue]406-arabella defiled ! "[180-jude] The hurrahs were repeated , drowning the faint organ notes . [Jude]180-jude 's face changed more : [he]180-jude whispered slowly , [his]180-jude parched lips scarcely moving : " Let the day perish wherein [I]180-jude was born , and the night in which it was said , There is [a man - child conceived]7672-a man - child conceived . "[180-jude] " Hurrah ! "[180-jude] " Let that day be darkness ; let not [God]385-god regard it from above , neither let the light shine upon it . [Lo]407-lo , let that night be solitary , let no joyful voice come therein . "[180-jude] " Hurrah ! "[180-jude] " Why died [I]180-jude not from the womb ? Why did [i]180-jude not give up the ghost when [I]180-jude came out of the belly ? ... For now should [I]180-jude have lain still and been quiet . [I]180-jude should have slept : then had [I]180-jude been at rest ! "[180-jude] " Hurrah ! "[180-jude] " There [the prisoners]7673-the prisoners rest together ; [they]7673-the prisoners hear not the voice of [the oppressor]7674-the oppressor ... The small and the great are there ; and [the servant]6043-the servant is free from [[his]6043-the servant master]7676-his master . Wherefore is light given to [him]6043-the servant that is in misery , and life unto the bitter in soul ? "[180-jude] Meanwhile [Arabella]406-arabella , in [her]406-arabella journey to discover what was going on , took a short cut down [a narrow street]3796-a narrow street and through [an obscure nook into [the quad of Cardinal]3798-the quad of cardinal]3797-an obscure nook into the quad of cardinal . [It]3797-an obscure nook into the quad of cardinal was full of bustle , and brilliant in the sunlight with flowers and other preparations for a ball here also . [A carpenter]3799-a carpenter nodded to [her]406-arabella , [one who had formerly been [a fellow - workman of [Jude]180-jude 's]3801-a fellow - workman of jude 's]3800-one who had formerly been a fellow - workman of jude 's . [A corridor]3802-a corridor was in course of erection from the entrance to [the hall staircase]3803-the hall staircase , of gay red and buff bunting . Waggon - loads of boxes containing bright plants in full bloom were being placed about , and the great staircase was covered with red cloth . [She]406-arabella nodded to [one workman]3804-one workman and another , and ascended to [the hall]6077-the hall on the strength of [their]3806-we acquaintance , where [they]3806-we were putting down a new floor and decorating for the dance . The cathedral bell close at hand was sounding for five o'clock service . " [I]406-arabella should not mind having a spin there with [a fellow]2351-a fellow 's arm round [my]406-arabella waist , "[406-arabella] [she]406-arabella said to [one of [the men]647-the men]4292-one of the men . " But [Lord]7678-lord , [I]406-arabella must be getting [home]3897-home again - there 's a lot to do . No dancing for [me]406-arabella ! "[406-arabella] When [she]406-arabella reached [home]3897-home [she]406-arabella was met at the door by [Stagg]375-stagg , and [one or two other of [[Jude]180-jude 's fellow stoneworkers]3811-jude 's fellow stoneworkers]3810-one or two other of jude 's fellow stoneworkers . " [We]3806-we are just going down to [the river]5250-the river , "[5732-the former] said [the former]5732-the former , " to see [the boat]7681-the boat - bumping . Well now , ca n't [you]406-arabella give [yourself]406-arabella half an hour 's relaxation , [Mrs. Fawley]180-jude , and come along with [us]3806-we ? ' Twould do [you]406-arabella good . "[406-arabella] " [I]406-arabella should like to go , "[406-arabella] said [she]406-arabella . " [I]406-arabella 've never seen [the boat]7681-the boat - racing , and [I]406-arabella hear it is good fun . "[406-arabella] " Come along ! "[406-arabella] " How [I]406-arabella WISH [I]406-arabella could ! "[406-arabella] [She]406-arabella looked longingly down [the street]4748-the street . " Wait a minute , then . "[406-arabella] [They]3814-they waited , and [she]406-arabella entered . [Downstairs]408-downstairs [the inmates]3815-the inmates were absent as before , having , in fact , gone in a body to [the river]5250-the river where the procession of [boats]3817-boats was to pass . When [she]406-arabella reached [the bedroom]3818-the bedroom [she]406-arabella found that [[her]406-arabella father]4197-her father had not even now come . " Why could n't [he]180-jude have been [here]3898-here ! "[406-arabella] [she]406-arabella said impatiently . " [He]180-jude wants to see [the boats]7686-the boats [himself]180-jude - that 's what it is ! "[406-arabella] However , on looking round to the bed [she]406-arabella brightened , for [she]406-arabella saw that [Jude]180-jude was apparently sleeping , though [he]180-jude was not in the usual half - elevated posture necessitated by [his]180-jude cough . [He]180-jude had slipped down , and lay flat . A second glance caused [her]406-arabella to start , and [she]406-arabella went to the bed . [His]180-jude face was quite white , and gradually becoming rigid . [She]406-arabella touched [his]180-jude fingers ; they were cold , though [his]180-jude body was still warm . [She]406-arabella listened at [his]180-jude chest . All was still within . The bumping of near thirty years had ceased . After [her]406-arabella first appalled sense of what had happened the faint notes of a military or other brass band from [the river]5250-the river reached [her]406-arabella ears ; and in a provoked tone [she]406-arabella exclaimed , " To think [he]180-jude should die just now ! Why did [he]180-jude die just now ! "[406-arabella] Then meditating another moment or two [she]406-arabella went to the door , softly closed it as before , and again descended the stairs . " [Here]3898-here [she]406-arabella is ! "[3821-one of the workmen] said [one of [the workmen]636-the workmen]3821-one of the workmen . " [We]3823-they wondered if [you]406-arabella were coming after all . Come along ; [we]3823-they must be quick to get a good place ... Well , how is [he]180-jude ? Sleeping well still ? Of course , [we]3823-they do n't want to drag ' [ee]180-jude away if - "[3821-one of the workmen] " Oh yes - sleeping quite sound . [He]180-jude wo n't wake yet , "[406-arabella] [she]406-arabella said hurriedly . [They]3823-they went with [the crowd]1411-the crowd down [Cardinal Street]158-cardinal street , where [they]3823-they presently reached [the bridge]4202-the bridge , and [the gay barges]3826-the gay barges burst upon [their]3823-they view . Thence [they]3823-they passed by a narrow slit down to [the riverside path]3827-the riverside path - now dusty , hot , and thronged . Almost as soon as [they]3823-they had arrived the grand procession of [boats]3817-boats began ; the oars smacking with a loud kiss on the face of [the stream]4177-the stream , as [they]3823-they were lowered from the perpendicular . " Oh , [I]406-arabella say - how jolly ! [I]406-arabella 'm glad [I]406-arabella 've come , "[406-arabella] said [Arabella]406-arabella . " And - it ca n't hurt [[my]406-arabella husband]1773-my husband - [my]406-arabella being away . "[406-arabella] On [the opposite side of [the river]5250-the river]3830-the opposite side of the river , on [the crowded barges]3832-the crowded barges , were [gorgeous nosegays of feminine beauty]3833-gorgeous nosegays of feminine beauty , fashionably arrayed in green , pink , blue , and white . The blue flag of [the boat club]3834-the boat club denoted the centre of interest , beneath which a band in red uniform gave out the notes [she]406-arabella had already heard in [the death - chamber]3835-the death - chamber . [Collegians of all sorts]3836-collegians of all sorts , in canoes with [ladies]3837-ladies , watching keenly for " [[our]7689-our "[4067-somebody] boat]7690-our " boat , darted up and down . While [she]406-arabella regarded the lively scene [somebody]4067-somebody touched [Arabella]406-arabella in the ribs , and looking round [she]406-arabella saw [Vilbert]189-vilbert . " [That philtre]7691-that philtre is operating , [you]406-arabella know ! "[189-vilbert] [he]189-vilbert said with a leer . " Shame on ' [ee]406-arabella to wreck a heart so ! "[189-vilbert] " [I]189-vilbert sha n't talk of love to - day . "[189-vilbert] " Why not ? It is a general holiday . "[406-arabella] [She]406-arabella did not reply . [Vilbert]189-vilbert 's arm stole round [her]406-arabella waist , which act could be performed unobserved in [the crowd]1411-the crowd . An arch expression overspread [Arabella]406-arabella 's face at the feel of the arm , but [she]406-arabella kept [her]406-arabella eyes on [the river]5250-the river as if [she]406-arabella did not know of the embrace . [The crowd]1411-the crowd surged , pushing [Arabella]406-arabella and [[her]406-arabella friends]4317-her friends sometimes nearly into [the river]5250-the river , and [she]406-arabella would have laughed heartily at the horse - play that succeeded , if the imprint on [her]406-arabella mind 's eye of a pale , statuesque countenance [she]406-arabella had lately gazed upon had not sobered [her]406-arabella a little . The fun on [the water]3844-the water reached the acme of excitement ; there were immersions , there were shouts : the race was lost and won , [the pink and blue and yellow ladies]3845-the pink and blue and yellow ladies retired from [the barges]3846-the barges , and [the people who had watched]3847-the people who had watched began to move . " Well - it 's been awfully good , "[406-arabella] cried [Arabella]406-arabella . " But [I]406-arabella think [I]406-arabella must get back to [[my]406-arabella poor man]2712-my poor man . [Father]228-father is there , so far as [I]406-arabella know ; but [I]406-arabella had better get back . "[406-arabella] " What 's [your]406-arabella hurry ? "[406-arabella] " Well , [I]406-arabella must go ... Dear , [dear]795-dear , this is awkward ! "[406-arabella] At [the narrow gangway where [the people]5006-the people ascended from [the riverside path]3827-the riverside path to [the bridge]4202-the bridge]3848-the narrow gangway where the people ascended from the riverside path to the bridge [the crowd]1411-the crowd was literally jammed into one hot mass - [Arabella]406-arabella and [Vilbert]189-vilbert with the rest ; and here [they]1411-the crowd remained motionless , [Arabella]406-arabella exclaiming , " [Dear]795-dear , [dear]795-dear ! "[406-arabella] more and more impatiently ; for it had just occurred to [her]406-arabella mind that if [Jude]180-jude were discovered to have died alone an inquest might be deemed necessary . " What a fidget [you]406-arabella are , [[my]4032-the physician love]7696-my love , "[4032-the physician] said [the physician]4032-the physician , who , being pressed close against [her]406-arabella by [the throng]3854-the throng , had no need of personal effort for contact . " Just as well have patience : there 's no getting away yet ! "[4032-the physician] It was nearly ten minutes before [the wedged multitude]3855-the wedged multitude moved sufficiently to let [them]3855-the wedged multitude pass through . As soon as [she]406-arabella got up into [the street]4748-the street [Arabella]406-arabella hastened on , forbidding [the physician]4032-the physician to accompany [her]406-arabella further that day . [She]406-arabella did not go straight to [[her]406-arabella house]4390-her house ; but to [the abode of [a woman who performed the last necessary offices for [the poorer dead]3861-the poorer dead]3860-a woman who performed the last necessary offices for the poorer dead]3859-the abode of a woman who performed the last necessary offices for the poorer dead ; where [she]3860-a woman who performed the last necessary offices for the poorer dead knocked . " [[My]406-arabella husband]1773-my husband has just gone , [poor soul]7633-poor soul , "[406-arabella] [she]406-arabella said . " Can [you]406-arabella come and lay [him]1773-my husband out ? "[406-arabella] By ten o'clock that night [Jude]180-jude was lying on the bedstead at [[his]180-jude lodging]4560-his lodging covered with a sheet , and straight as an arrow . Through the partly opened window the joyous throb of a waltz entered from [the ball - room at [Cardinal]403-cardinal]3867-the ball - room at cardinal . Two days later , when the sky was equally cloudless , and the air equally still , [two persons]3868-two persons stood beside [Jude]180-jude 's open coffin in [the same little bedroom]3869-the same little bedroom . On one side was [Arabella]406-arabella , on the other [the Widow Edlin]309-the widow edlin . [They]3868-two persons were both looking at [Jude]180-jude 's face , the worn old eyelids of [Mrs. Edlin]313-mrs. edlin being red . " How beautiful [he]180-jude is ! "[313-mrs. edlin] said [she]313-mrs. edlin . " Yes . [He]180-jude 's a ' andsome corpse , "[406-arabella] said [Arabella]406-arabella . The window was still open to ventilate [the room]4227-the room , and it being about noontide the clear air was motionless and quiet without . From a distance came voices ; and an apparent noise of [persons]3871-persons stamping . " What 's that ? "[1006-the old woman] murmured [the old woman]1006-the old woman . " Oh , that 's [the doctors in [the theatre]6924-the theatre]7700-the doctors in the theatre , conferring honorary degrees on [the Duke of [Hamptonshire]160-hamptonshire]7702-the duke of hamptonshire and [a lot more illustrious gents of that sort]7703-a lot more illustrious gents of that sort . It 's Remembrance Week , [you]7704-you know . The cheers come from [the young men]7705-the young men . "[1006-the old woman] " Aye ; [young and strong - lunged]7706-young and strong - lunged ! Not like [[our]7707-our poor boy]7708-our poor boy here . "[3871-persons] An occasional word , as from [some one making a speech]3873-some one making a speech , floated from the open windows of [the theatre]6924-the theatre across to this quiet corner , at which there seemed to be a smile of some sort upon the marble features of [Jude]180-jude ; while the old , superseded , Delphin editions of [Virgil]196-virgil and [Horace]197-horace , and the dog - eared Greek Testament on the neighbouring shelf , and the few other volumes of the sort that [he]180-jude had not parted with , roughened with stone - dust where [he]180-jude had been in the habit of catching them up for a few minutes between [his]180-jude labours , seemed to pale to a sickly cast at the sounds . The bells struck out joyously ; and their reverberations travelled round the bed - room . [Arabella]406-arabella 's eyes removed from [Jude]180-jude to [Mrs. Edlin]313-mrs. edlin . " D'ye think [she]7708-our poor boy will come ? "[406-arabella] [she]406-arabella asked . " [I]406-arabella could not say . [She]7708-our poor boy swore not to see [him]180-jude again . "[406-arabella] " How is [she]7708-our poor boy looking ? "[180-jude] " Tired and miserable , poor heart . Years and years older than when [you]406-arabella saw [her]7708-our poor boy last . Quite [a staid , worn woman]7709-a staid , worn woman now . ' Tis [the man]607-the man - [she]7708-our poor boy ca n't stomach un , even now ! "[406-arabella] " If [Jude]180-jude had been alive to see [her]7708-our poor boy , [he]180-jude would hardly have cared for [her]7708-our poor boy any more , perhaps . "[406-arabella] " That 's what [we]7711-we do n't know ... Did n't [he]180-jude ever ask [you]406-arabella to send for [her]7708-our poor boy , since [he]180-jude came to see [her]7708-our poor boy in that strange way ? "[180-jude] " No . Quite the contrary . [I]406-arabella offered to send , and [he]180-jude said [I]406-arabella was not to let [her]7708-our poor boy know how ill [he]180-jude was . "[406-arabella] " Did [he]180-jude forgive [her]7708-our poor boy ? "[406-arabella] " Not as [I]180-jude know . "[180-jude] " Well - poor little thing , ' tis to be believed [she]3875-she 's found forgiveness somewhere ! [She]3875-she said [she]3875-she had found peace ! "[406-arabella] [She]3875-she may swear that on [her]3875-she knees to the holy cross upon [her]3875-she necklace till [she]3875-she 's hoarse , but it wo n't be true ! " said [Arabella]406-arabella . "[3875-she] [She]3875-she 's never found peace since [she]3875-she left [his]3876-his arms , and never will again till [she]3875-she 's as [he]3876-his is now ! "
